tvdb: Jack and Lucy look for Tess at GH.  Chris tells Ian that Tess healed his soul.  Ian gets Tess's DNA results and is shocked by the results.  Alison tells Rafe they should go to Stephen Clay's concert to learn more about the mysterious Stephen.  Jack finds Tess in the woods but she leads him to the concert, where Livvie and, later, Lucy show up.  As the concert starts, Lucy gets a bad feeling.  Rafe and Ali are shocked to see Tess, then Livvie.  After the band begins playing, Stephen finally emerges and his resemblance to Caleb shocks the crowd.  Rafe thinks he's Caleb, but he greets Port Charles as Stephen Clay.
